def_cn: （人、动物或植物）有两性特征的，雌雄同体的，雌雄同序的
def_en: In biology, an androgynous person, animal, or plant has both male and female sexual characteristics.

def_cn: 兼具两性的；双性并存的；男女不分的
def_en: If you describe someone as androgynous, you mean that they are not distinctly masculine or feminine in appearance or in behaviour.
